long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: DIY Opt Out Assistant for opting out of data brokers. Remove your personal data from the Internet and save yourself from scams, identity theft, nosy folks. Be in control yourself and see how quick, easy and safe it is to remove your personal data online. Remove your own and your loved one's personal information! It's scary not to remove your email address, phone numbers, name, age, home addresses, real estate investments and more. Every day you leave it available is another day you can become a target.  Install the DIYOPTOUT extension today.
